front.title: IEEE Standard for Digital Test Interchange Format (DTIF)
front.abstract: The information content and the data formats for the interchange of digital test program data between digital automated test program generators (DATPGs) and automatic test equipment (ATE) for board-level printed circuit assemblies are defined. This information can be broadly grouped into data that defines the following: the UUT (unit under test) model, stimulus and response, the fault dictionary, and probes.
